attributes.action: Urge the Football League to stand firm when dealing with Leeds United
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because we are fed up with moaning leeds fans. How they complain about how unfair it is that "The Mighty Leeds" are too big to be relegated and should receive unfair treatment as given out to the run of the mill football league members.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
